about_the_game:
Shattered Melodies is a project by, Ayo Games, that pushes the boundaries of interactive storytelling.
Shattered Melodies follows the journey of Attrell, a young man who must navigate a world filled with challenges and emotions.

When his sister Lyra goes missing, Attrell embarks on a quest to rediscover his past and find his sister,

using the power of music to heal and overcome obstacles.
